firm_information.name: CENTURY 21 Quad J Realty
firm_information.location: 1305 N. E. Big Bend Trail Glen Rose, TX 76043

house_listing.house_location: 108 Summit Edge Court Glen Rose, TEXAS 76043
house_listing.house_description: This beautiful native stone home sits at the end of a cul-de-sac in one of the finest subdivisions in Glen Rose. You not only reside at the end, but you own the turn around area - a total of 2 acres. The house features a gourmet kitchen, with island Jenaire stove, a built-in refrigerator, and all the amenities. The living area has high ceilings and an open concept for gracious living. Other features include large walkin closets with many built-ins, large upstairs gameroom with wet bar, and a convenient entertainment center built-in. A must see at a great price!!

highlights.item: 2 Acres in town - end of cul-de-sac
Gourmet kitchen with all appliances built in
